title: Highlights from the Annual Rath Yatra
description: A video showcasing the magnificent chariots and the devotional fervor of the millions who participate in the Puri Rath Yatra.

title: Swami Nischalananda Saraswati on Dharma
description: A powerful talk by the Shankaracharya on the role of Dharma in modern society and the path of righteousness.
